document_data.caption: A map showing Kaoth Alley in southwest Daggerford.
document_data.name: Kaoth Alley
document_data.mainbody: '''Kaoth Alley''' was a small road found in the city of [[Daggerford]] in the [[Western Heartlands]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}
document_data.Location: Kaoth Alley was located in the southern section of Daggerford near the [[River Gate]]. The alley was nestled between [[Wall Street (Daggerford)|Wall Street]] and [[Water Street]].
document_data.Notable Locations:
Notable buildings located along Kaoth Alley included:

* [[Watermen's Circle]]
* [[Mariners' Alliance]]
